articles.author: Brian Stelter, CNN Business
articles.title: Jury deliberates punitive damages for Alex Jones in Sandy Hook defamation suit
articles.description: A Texas jury now has to decide whether Alex Jones will have to pay punitive damages to the parents of Sandy Hook shooting victim Jesse Lewis.

articles.title: CNN speaks to the doctor who performed an abortion on 10-year-old - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Brianna Keilar talks to Dr. Bernard, the OB/GYN who performed an abortion on a 10-year-old rape survivor from Ohio after the child traveled to Indiana to have the procedure after the Supreme Court overturning of Roe v. Wade.

articles.title: Video: Go inside a village recaptured from Russians - CNN Video
articles.description: The village of Ivanivka in southern Ukraine, has been recaptured from Russian forces following a two-week artillery battle. It remains deserted. 'Playboy,' a Commander of Ukraine's Air Reconnaissance Unit, takes CNN's Nic Robertson to see what's left behind.

articles.title: Huge relief as Ukrainian grain shipped out, but the food crisis isn't going anywhere

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Trevor Reed: Brittney Griner's Russian prison sentence is 'clearly political'
articles.description: Trevor Reed, a US citizen freed earlier this year after being detained in Russia for nearly three years, said Friday that Brittney Griner's sentence by a Russian court is "clearly political."
articles.content:

articles.title: Workers in these two industries are the only ones coming out ahead right now
articles.description: At first glance, it looks like many Americans got big pay raises since the Covid-19 pandemic started.
articles.content:

articles.title: Ukrainian-born GOP lawmaker rankles colleagues with Kyiv criticism

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: DOJ talks with Trump lawyers mark a grave moment for the ex-President
articles.description: Liz Cheney has posed the question with which America may have to wrestle for months to come: if there is evidence that ex-President Donald Trump committed crimes in seeking to overturn the 2020 election, what message will it send if he's not charged?

articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Three more ships laden with grain departed from Ukraine on Friday under a UN-brokered deal aimed at easing the global food crisis, according to Ukrainian officials. Follow live updates here.
